content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the defendant had to pay a total of €36045 which included various fees the court decided to dissolve the marriage and awarded a mercedes benz vehicle to the applicant the vehicle was considered personal property acquired during the marriage the case involved three articles from the civil code related to joint matrimonial property and the obligations of spouses the applicant filed for the dissolution of the marriage claiming it was the defendants fault they also requested to keep their surname and establish the legal consequences of the divorce on their property rights the court approved the application and declared the marriage dissolved due to the defendants fault the applicant will retain their surname and both parties are entitled to maintenance the defendant was ordered to pay the applicants costs and state costs for procedural documents
